Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.6056249 0.3183755 0.6547338 0.9503281 0.1331002 0.9778350 0.5032438
#>  [8] 0.8725805 0.8241266 0.9817019 0.7131771 0.3722116 0.2306669 0.2525513
#> [15] 0.5699167 0.9329170 0.1814275 0.1805554 0.5344429 0.3427262
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.721591032 0.869560666 0.150719464 0.833678898 0.270007643 0.023806688
#>  [7] 0.095162450 0.011332601 0.001757054 0.137489472 0.235949838 0.436180653
#> [13] 0.160722098 0.212861509 0.777297326 0.440638168 0.950755751 0.057566650
#> [19] 0.048967863 0.660210736

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.32901815 0.10286903 0.01390811 0.41998192 0.52644208 0.66974625
#>  [7] 0.18133064 0.03179400 0.32632765 0.47676316
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.4876186 0.2332406 0.7056690 0.8661226 0.8386970 0.3671606 0.8291602
#>  [8] 0.7683178 0.7850951 0.7981576
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.1821215 0.2467231 0.5884807 0.1766500 0.5551678 0.7346648 0.5135585
#>  [8] 0.9461857 0.4595663 0.9893042

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.05768745 0.51538171 0.32483529 0.47706739 0.59629272
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.8269586 0.6748401 0.7402815 0.1763399 0.4153594
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.4185768 0.2221666 0.6434767 0.4874735 0.7621651
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.4967705 0.7948032 0.5556616 0.4734001 0.1939156

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.9974317 0.9039494 0.1916714 0.7265678 0.5894546
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.12828669 0.98265336 0.02217122 0.36097000 0.27259310
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.08706523 0.45825838 0.09045293 0.61384214 0.45742257
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.36978552 0.04302052 0.47893708 0.45015068 0.54313885

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.003871606 0.402300599 0.123164785 0.715419408 0.370754284
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.4626275 0.5313709 0.9250804 0.2702705 0.1870485
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.26046663 0.09719282 0.74963675 0.76407017 0.58090724
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.8787955 0.1341210 0.7869661 0.6815899 0.4664341

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.0         3.0          4.8         1.8  virginica
#> 2          5.7         3.0          4.2         1.2 versicolor
#> 3          4.4         2.9          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 4          5.9         3.0          5.1         1.8  virginica
#> 5          6.4         3.1          5.5         1.8  virginica
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.0         3.0          1.6         0.2     setosa
#> 2          4.8         3.4          1.9         0.2     setosa
#> 3          5.7         2.8          4.1         1.3 versicolor
#> 4          5.1         3.8          1.9         0.4     setosa
#> 5          6.3         2.5          4.9         1.5 versicolor
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          4.6         3.6          1.0         0.2     setosa
#> 2          6.2         2.9          4.3         1.3 versicolor
#> 3          6.7         3.3          5.7         2.1  virginica
#> 4          6.5         3.2          5.1         2.0  virginica
#> 5          6.7         3.3          5.7         2.5  virginica

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.3         3.4
#> 2           6.7         3.0
#> 3           6.4         3.2
#> 4           5.7         2.8
#> 5           5.1         2.5
#> 6           6.9         3.1
#> 7           5.0         3.2
#> 8           5.4         3.7
#> 9           6.3         3.3
#> 10          6.2         2.8
#> 11          5.0         3.6
#> 12          5.6         2.8
#> 13          6.9         3.1
#> 14          6.7         3.3
#> 15          4.9         2.4
#> 16          6.9         3.1
#> 17          6.5         3.0
#> 18          5.7         2.5
#> 19          6.3         2.5
#> 20          6.3         2.7

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.9         3.1
#> 2          4.8         3.0
#> 3          4.6         3.1
#> 4          5.0         3.5
#> 5          6.1         2.6
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.8         3.4
#> 2          5.5         4.2
#> 3          6.4         2.7
#> 4          5.4         3.9
#> 5          6.3         2.9
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          7.6         3.0
#> 2          5.9         3.0
#> 3          5.5         4.2
#> 4          6.4         2.7
#> 5          6.6         3.0
